body:
I know I made another post before but I'll archive that, anyways, this one's for T4....

OBS! You need to have access for both Skype and Teamspeak and you have to stay active on the server and on scrims.
When you've applied, we will trial you.
AND, dont hate us if we dont get to trial everyone before the tournament because we dont have really much time to trial everyone, so if you get accepted/trialed after the tourney or during the tourney, its just lack of time...

How To Apply:

Skype:
Timezone:
Age (alternative):
Youtube (If you have):
Prefered Position:
Second Prefered Position:
Can You Defend If Nobody Else Can?
Kills:
Deaths:
K/D:
Time Spent On Avicus (Check profile):


Thanks for applying!

Also, dont forget to check out my YouTube Channel!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ6MHwcb70gUz8EtWIB9xGg
